title: He has returned.
body:
So this just got posted by League of Legends Twitter:

https://twitter.com/LeagueOfLegends/status/704380696630939649

Looks like pantheon's awaiting the arrival of a new champion! Perhaps that comet from "The Spear of Targon" refers to this? I dunno. Either way it seems like a new Targonian champion might just be on the horizon right now.

EDIT: Just a note for folks, I personally doubt it's Taric, given Riot's stated in the past that they have him slated for sometime between the release of the champion after Jhin and the champion after that fellow, so the earliest timing would be sometime in late march or early April. Of course timings can change as things fluctuate but it's something to keep in mind.

replies.body: Sharjo. Quickest draw in these parts.

My secret is weapon is following way to many Rioters, Riot accounts and League of Legends news stuff on Twitter!

Also I'm going to assume your appearance here means you're our new Targonian's primary writer FauxSchizzle. Until proven otherwise I will stick to this assumption!

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dyFwX6Zd,comment-id=000a0001,timestamp=2016-02-29T19:36:25.554+0000)
>
> My secret is weapon is following way to many Rioters, Riot accounts and League of Legends news stuff on Twitter!
> 
> Also I'm going to assume that this means you're our new Targonian's primary writer. Until proven otherwise I will stick to this assumption!

Deduction suits you well, sir.
Sooooo is this just Pantheon's "ascension" scene that came out late by mistake? :D

Probably not. It seems to describe to last part of Panth's new lore entry:

> A comet of burning fire streaked down toward the distant mountains, a hundred miles east.

> Pantheon’s eyes narrowed.

> “It is time, then,” he said to the darkness, and began the long journey back to Mount Targon.
Pantheon is just really into astrology. "It is time, then, to seek new exciting opportunities that could bring in love or financial prospects," is how the line originally read. I think.
Ha hah!
High Noon Sharjo skin ;)?

High noon Nautilus. 

That's his main if I remember correctly.

Nautilus?!

He just gained +3 Metal ratings.

I play a lot of Bard, Sona, Tahm Kench and Poppy nowadays, but Nautilus was my FIRST main and shares a spot with Nami as my favourite champion in League.

{{champion:111}} _"Drag them down."_
http://24.media.tumblr.com/11dc7c2aaee0c768971e224bec3aadc4/tumblr_n0y6lfyIMx1sx18rto1_250.gif
Pretty bold of Riot to bring Urf the Manatee back this way.

> [{quoted}](name=Merxamers,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dyFwX6Zd,comment-id=0022,timestamp=2016-02-29T22:18:56.730+0000)
>
> Pretty bold of Riot to bring Urf the Manatee back this way.

Nothing but the best for the Manatee of the hour.
I'd just like to say that we have to hear this kind of joke on a regular basis. We also keep whiskey handy. Those two facts are related.

wait its still alive after both warwick and nami, tear his skin down and wear it just for fun of it

Lee Sin W is really op, nerf it 

(there was a splash with lee sin and urf)

bad joke, farewell

New champ...

...or maybe the new origins of {{champion:44}} ?

Edit: The wording "returned" suggests we have seen this champ before, could really by Aurelion Sol as well.
It's not Taric. They said there is at least one new champion before we see the new Taric.
Coincidentally, there are two empty slots for Targon, allowing a champion and then Taric afterwards. Im calling Aurelion Sol and then Taric.

Agreed, typical Riot tricksiness. I'll be really glad if they keep Taric's other-world backstory, I'm finding it a bit disheartening how EVERYONE from another world's been forced to be from a faction as of late :P

Would seem a bit strange for gems to be tied in with celestial stuff, but I guess anything goes.

Holding my breath though; it was stated a while back that Taric's slated for after the champion who would come after Jhin, so I think it's a new champion.

isn't taric originally from another world anyway in his original lore?

EDIT: kinda like malphite
http://31.media.tumblr.com/6e42220405a99ecc392e078f07508397/tumblr_mu29fhhsiR1qlh7rxo2_500.gif

"The clouds split and skies burst as its brilliant form descended from the heavens. With an unearthly cry, its voice rang out:

'YOU GODDAMN KIDS' the air screamed with a language long forgotten

'WON'T SHUT THE HELL UP FOR 5 FUCKING MINUTES SO I CAN TAKE A GODDAMN NAP'

It's body coiled menacingly above the mountain

'I HAVE WORK IN THE MORNING!'"

Kyogre: FUCK

Groudon: OH SHIT
What is Pantheon doing then?Shouldn't he be preparing a welcoming cake for this new stranger?

> [{quoted}](name=Jeddy017,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dyFwX6Zd,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-02-29T19:31:58.849+0000)

What should Pantheon write on this cake?

"What took you so long >:("

complete with emoticon instead of just actually making a face out of icing

"Welcome Ao Shin"

Just to make things REALLY awkward.

looks a lot like a pantheon surprise VU is coming,but I kinda doubt that(I mean in that case they would have likely released his new lore alongside the VU)

A new champion is of course a possibility(doubt it would be aurelion sol,i mean a sun dragon coming from the night sky would be kinda weird) or a Taric VU would also be likely,I mean if Taric is a celestial aspect as well,then he migh thave made a similar journey as pantheon in which case he would really "come back" to runeterra.
Sol doesn't have to mean Sun. It could mean star too. In which case, a star dragon would be appropriate, since the Targon people have so much folklore put into the stars and celestial bodies.

> [{quoted}](name=Psychodrive,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dyFwX6Zd,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2016-02-29T20:00:30.360+0000)
>
> Sol doesn't have to mean Sun. It could mean star too. In which case, a star dragon would be appropriate, since the Targon people have so much folklore put into the stars and celestial bodies.
